info.name: Wallet Service API - Staging
info.description:
Wallet Microservice - Credit management, balance operations, and transaction tracking

Base URL: http://localhost:8208
Environment: Staging (Docker)
Version: 1.0.0

Capabilities:
- Wallet creation and management
- Balance operations (deposit, withdraw, consume)
- Transaction tracking and history
- User and wallet statistics
- Multi-currency support

item.name: Wallet Management

request.description:
Create a new wallet for a user

Request Body:
- user_id: User identifier (required)
- wallet_type: Type of wallet (default: "fiat")
- initial_balance: Starting balance (default: 0.00)
- currency: Wallet currency (default: "CREDIT")
- metadata: Additional wallet metadata (optional)

Response:
- success: boolean
- wallet_id: Generated wallet identifier
- user_id: user identifier
- balance: wallet balance
- currency: wallet currency
- created_at: creation timestamp

Note: Wallet ID is automatically saved to {{wallet_id}} variable

Get detailed information about a specific wallet

Path Parameters:
- wallet_id: Wallet identifier (required)

Response:
- wallet_id: wallet identifier
- user_id: user identifier
- wallet_type: wallet type
- balance: current balance
- currency: wallet currency
- status: active/inactive
- created_at: creation timestamp
- updated_at: last update timestamp
- metadata: wallet metadata

exec: // If wallet exists, save the first wallet ID

request.description:
Get all wallets for a specific user

Path Parameters:
- user_id: User identifier (required)

Response:
- wallets: array of wallet objects
  - wallet_id: wallet identifier
  - wallet_type: wallet type
  - balance: current balance
  - currency: wallet currency
  - status: active/inactive
  - created_at: creation timestamp
- count: number of wallets

Note: First wallet ID is automatically saved to {{wallet_id}} variable

Get the current balance of a wallet

Path Parameters:
- wallet_id: Wallet identifier (required)

Response:
- success: boolean
- wallet_id: wallet identifier
- balance: current balance
- currency: wallet currency
- last_updated: last transaction timestamp

item.description:
Wallet creation, retrieval, and management endpoints.

Features:

item.name: Transaction Operations

exec: // Save transaction ID to collection variable

request.description:
Deposit funds into a wallet

Path Parameters:
- wallet_id: Wallet identifier (required)

Request Body:
- amount: Amount to deposit (required, must be positive)
- description: Transaction description (required)
- reference_id: External reference ID (optional)
- metadata: Additional transaction metadata (optional)

Response:
- success: boolean
- transaction_id: transaction identifier
- wallet_id: wallet identifier
- amount: deposited amount
- balance: new wallet balance
- currency: wallet currency
- timestamp: transaction timestamp

Note: Transaction ID is automatically saved to {{transaction_id}} variable

exec: // Save transaction ID to collection variable

request.description:
Withdraw funds from a wallet

Path Parameters:
- wallet_id: Wallet identifier (required)

Request Body:
- amount: Amount to withdraw (required, must be positive)
- description: Transaction description (required)
- destination: Withdrawal destination (optional)
- metadata: Additional transaction metadata (optional)

Response:
- success: boolean
- transaction_id: transaction identifier
- wallet_id: wallet identifier
- amount: withdrawn amount
- balance: new wallet balance
- currency: wallet currency
- timestamp: transaction timestamp

Note: Withdrawal will fail if insufficient balance. Transaction ID is automatically saved to {{transaction_id}} variable

exec: // Save transaction ID to collection variable

request.description:
Consume credits from a wallet (e.g., for service usage)

Path Parameters:
- wallet_id: Wallet identifier (required)

Request Body:
- amount: Amount to consume (required, must be positive)
- description: Transaction description (required)
- metadata: Additional transaction metadata (optional)

Response:
- success: boolean
- transaction_id: transaction identifier
- wallet_id: wallet identifier
- amount: consumed amount
- balance: new wallet balance
- currency: wallet currency
- timestamp: transaction timestamp

Note: Consumption will fail if insufficient balance. Transaction ID is automatically saved to {{transaction_id}} variable

Transfer funds from one wallet to another

Path Parameters:
- wallet_id: Source wallet identifier (required)

Request Body:
- to_wallet_id: Destination wallet identifier (required)
- amount: Amount to transfer (required, must be positive)
- description: Transaction description (required)
- metadata: Additional transaction metadata (optional)

Response:
- success: boolean
- transaction_id: transaction identifier
- from_wallet_id: source wallet identifier
- to_wallet_id: destination wallet identifier
- amount: transferred amount
- from_balance: new source wallet balance
- to_balance: new destination wallet balance
- timestamp: transaction timestamp

Note: Transfer will fail if insufficient balance in source wallet

item.description:
Transaction operation endpoints for managing wallet funds.

Supported operations:
- Deposit: Add funds to wallet
- Withdraw: Remove funds from wallet
- Consume: Deduct credits for service usage
- Transfer: Move funds between wallets

All operations are atomic and maintain transaction history

item.name: Transaction History

query.description: Maximum number of transactions to return
Filter by transaction type (deposit, withdraw, consume, transfer)

request.description:
Get transaction history for a specific wallet

Path Parameters:
- wallet_id: Wallet identifier (required)

Query Parameters:
- limit: Maximum number of transactions (default: 50)
- offset: Number of transactions to skip (default: 0)
- transaction_type: Filter by type (optional)
- start_date: Filter from date (optional)
- end_date: Filter until date (optional)

Response:
- transactions: array of transaction objects
  - transaction_id: transaction identifier
  - wallet_id: wallet identifier
  - transaction_type: deposit/withdraw/consume/transfer
  - amount: transaction amount
  - balance_after: balance after transaction
  - description: transaction description
  - status: completed/pending/failed
  - created_at: transaction timestamp
  - metadata: transaction metadata
- count: number of transactions
- limit: requested limit
- offset: requested offset

query.description: Maximum number of transactions to return

request.description:
Get transaction history for all wallets belonging to a user

Path Parameters:
- user_id: User identifier (required)

Query Parameters:
- limit: Maximum number of transactions (default: 50)
- offset: Number of transactions to skip (default: 0)
- wallet_id: Filter by specific wallet (optional)
- transaction_type: Filter by type (optional)

Response:
- transactions: array of transaction objects across all user wallets
  - transaction_id: transaction identifier
  - wallet_id: wallet identifier
  - transaction_type: deposit/withdraw/consume/transfer
  - amount: transaction amount
  - balance_after: balance after transaction
  - description: transaction description
  - status: completed/pending/failed
  - created_at: transaction timestamp
  - metadata: transaction metadata
- count: number of transactions
- limit: requested limit
- offset: requested offset

item.description:
Transaction history and query endpoints.

Features:
- View wallet transaction history
- View user transaction history across all wallets
- Filter by transaction type, date range
- Pagination support

item.name: Statistics

request.description:
Get statistical information for a specific wallet

Path Parameters:
- wallet_id: Wallet identifier (required)

Response:
- wallet_id: wallet identifier
- statistics:
  - total_deposits: sum of all deposits
  - total_withdrawals: sum of all withdrawals
  - total_consumed: sum of all consumptions
  - total_transferred_out: sum of transfers out
  - total_transferred_in: sum of transfers in
  - transaction_count: total number of transactions
  - average_transaction_amount: average transaction size
  - first_transaction: timestamp of first transaction
  - last_transaction: timestamp of last transaction
  - current_balance: current wallet balance

Get statistical information for all wallets belonging to a user

Path Parameters:
- user_id: User identifier (required)

Response:
- user_id: user identifier
- statistics:
  - total_wallets: number of wallets
  - total_balance: sum of all wallet balances
  - total_deposits: sum of all deposits across wallets
  - total_withdrawals: sum of all withdrawals across wallets
  - total_consumed: sum of all consumptions across wallets
  - total_transactions: total number of transactions
  - average_transaction_amount: average transaction size
  - most_active_wallet: wallet with most transactions
  - first_transaction: timestamp of first transaction
  - last_transaction: timestamp of last transaction
- wallets: array of wallet summaries

Get user credit balance (backward compatibility endpoint)

Path Parameters:
- user_id: User identifier (required)

Response:
- success: boolean
- user_id: user identifier
- balance: credit balance
- currency: wallet currency (CREDIT)
- wallet_id: associated wallet identifier

Note: This endpoint provides backward compatibility with legacy systems. For new integrations, use the standard wallet balance endpoints.
